meanings.definition: To surpass in painting or artistic skill.
meanings.sent1: She outpaints her classmates with her beautiful artwork.
meanings.sent2: The famous artist always outpaints his competitors in every exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outpaints her dad in their friendly painting competition.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity outpaints the boundaries of traditional art.
meanings.sent5: His masterpiece truly outpaints all others in the gallery.

meanings.definition: To exceed in painting quality or technique.
meanings.sent1: The new paintbrush outpaints the old one in creating fine details.
meanings.sent2: Her attention to detail always outpaints her peers' work.
meanings.sent3: The paint color unexpectedly outpaints the original shade on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her unique style outpaints the conventional techniques used by others.
meanings.sent5: The artist's dedication outpaints any obstacles in achieving perfection.
